data.he: Once upon a time, deep in the ocean, there lived a monkey named Max. Max was a curious monkey and loved to explore the ocean. One day, Max heard a legend about a magic wizard's hat that could be found at the bottom of the ocean. Max knew he had to find it, so he put on his diving gear and set out to find the magic hat.
data.she: Once upon a time, deep in the ocean, there lived a monkey named Winkie. Winkie was a curious monkey and loved to explore the ocean. One day, Winkie heard a legend about a magic wizard's hat that could be found at the bottom of the ocean. Winkie knew she had to find it, so she put on her diving gear and set out to find the magic hat.

data.he: Max swam through colorful coral reefs, past schools of brightly-colored fish, and through dark caves. He searched for the hat high and low, but he couldn't find it. Just when Max was about to give up, he saw a bright light in the distance. He swam towards it and found a magical underwater cave. Inside the cave, Max saw the wizard's hat sitting on a rock.

Inside the cave, Winkie saw the wizard's hat sitting on a rock.

data.he: Max was so excited that he quickly swam to the hat and picked it up. But as soon as he touched the hat, a powerful sea witch appeared. The sea witch was very angry that Max had found her hat and warned him that if he didn't give it back, she would turn him into seaweed.
